page.title: 07GT.PORTERS FARM 8 ASH GREEN
page.content: { { {GREAT PORTERS FARM:}IT IS OWNED BY MR CHALMLEY.BEFORE HE OWNED IT MR COOPER BLAND DID.IT IS 350 ACRES(143 HECTARES.)THE CROPS ARE MAIZE, WHEAT BARLEY AND OATS.THE CROPS ARE ROTATED EVERY YEAR.THEY HAVE A COMBINE HARVESTER THAT SEPERATES THE GRAIN FROM THE WHEAT.A BAILER WHICH MAKES BALES OF STRAW({10,000 }A DAY ) 6 TRACTORS WHICH DO ANY PULLING WORK. THEY ALSO FIX THEIR MACHINERY,USUALLY IN THE WINTER.THEY HAVE SOME WOODEN BARNS SOME BREEZE BLOCK PIG STIES AND BARNS,A BRICK FARMHOUSE. THEY HAVE{121 CATTLE,{1894}SHEEPS AND LAMBS AND{110 PIGS AND PIGLETS.THEY SELL THEIR CATTLE AT THE COLCHESTER MARKET IN SEVERALLS LANE.
